name: A Ghostly Memoir
description:
-A Ghostly Memoir-

This is a small narrative about ponderings and wonderings that I've had about ghosts and my house over the years. 

Music suggestion is anything contemplative and peaceful. (Might I suggest some Saint-Saëns?)

 Speech bubble design lovingly stolen from Space Bubble Cat by Emma Dee. 

Entry for the November Bitsy Jam: Ghosts

Warning: Discusses death and ghosts but in a very contemplative way so it's really not that bad, just thought I'd put it out there.

Hack by @mildmojo.
